title: 307. Gabriel Bergmoser - The True Colour Of A Little White Lie
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Gabriel Bergmoser chats to Dani Vee about his new YA novel The True Colour Of A Little White Lie. We chat about writing in various genres, accepting feedback, finding your tribe and having difficult conversations with yourself.
